markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Tripline Arrow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1754)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 24</row>

**Price** 6 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** [arrow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=83)

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This arrow unspools a line of wire as its flies at its target. The wire animates as it hits a target and attempts to wrap around its legs before vanishing a moment later. If you can apply the bow's [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235), you can choose to knock the target [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) instead of pinning the target. If you cannot apply the bow's critical specialization effect, you can instead attempt to use the arrow to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) with the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) skill as if the bow had the [trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196) weapon trait. The arrow's unwieldy nature halves its weapon's range increment.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Tripline Arrow

text: <title level="1" right="Item 2" pfs="Limited" > Tripline Arrow May contain spoilers from Kingmaker Source Kingmaker Companion Guide pg. 24 Price 6 gp Ammunition arrow --- This arrow unspools a line of wire as its flies at its target. The wire animates as it hits a target and attempts to wrap around its legs before vanishing a moment later. If you can apply the bow's critical specialization effect, you can choose to knock the target prone instead of pinning the target. If you cannot apply the bow's critical specialization effect, you can instead attempt to use the arrow to Trip with the Athletics skill as if the bow had the trip weapon trait. The arrow's unwieldy nature halves its weapon's range increment.
